subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_00D0_01C9D9F6.70251370
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Yeah-I wondered about that. But I believe Adobe does have a freeware versio=
n, or a trial version. That maybe is what he is giving out. Ebay is pretty =
good and catching pirated software.

I know first hand, I was selling softw=
are on eBay for a while. Evidently one time I had gotten a hold of some pir=
ated software from one of my vendors, who probably didn't know it was fake =
either. Anyway, completely unbeknownst to me, I was selling a batch of fake=
 software. They caught it and told me it was counterfeit and to cease selli=
ng it, which I promptly did of course. LOL!!!

After that, I no longer trus=
ted the software I was getting, and got out of the software business.

Apri=
l

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: don powell 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 9:19 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] =
Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?






  Actually, I'd report them t=
o eBay for giving away pirated software! :)  He says he will give you a cop=
y of Adobe Audition free.  I'd think adobe might have something to say abou=
t that... 

  Don




-----------------------------------------------------=
-------------------------
  From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghost=
research.com>
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 =
10:12:23 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box=
?



  The Fraud part is what he is saying about you Frank, that you charge=
 thousands of dollars for your boxes.

    ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
  From: Frank Sumption 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
    Sent: Thursda=
y, May 21, 2009 9:10 AM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sor=
ta Frank's Box?



     It's not fraud, these hack boxes work, it's just th=
e guy has no clue how it works, and trends mis-represent it's function.  RS=
 is in fact discontiuing the radios, although there appears the other--more=
 expensive radios that would work as boxes. 

     I know, I get kinda hars=
h, but if someone to set themselves up as experts, at least understand the =
damn concepts  involved. Don't keep regurgitating the same urban myth crap =
that everyone else throws out there as facts.

     Frank-S
